## LocalAuthService class

Local authentication service that: - Validates identifiers - Hashes passwords - Verifies passwords - Delegates user creation/update to a user service

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class LocalAuthService<UserType, S extends IUserRepository<any, BaseCreateUserData>> implements ILocalAuthService<UserType, Parameters<S["create"]>[0]> 
```
